title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, January 10, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of the poet Dorianne Laux (1952), who wrote, “you shouldn't identify with your poems so closely that when they are cut, you're the one that bleeds.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of the poet Dorianne Laux (1952), who wrote, “you shouldn't identify with your poems so closely that when they are cut, you're the one that bleeds.”
